name: Han (Jerika) Nguyen
about: A highly skilled, competent, and diligent individual is seeking an opportunity to establish a career as a Data Analyst. Certified with Diploma from Claude Bernard University Lyon 1. Strong willingness to exhibit my proficiency in PYTHON, SQL, BI tools, Statistics and Computing Methodologies in the professional environment.
